intro: Ixia capitata var. stellata, commonly known as the star lily, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Amaryllidaceae family and is characterized by its striking, star-shaped flowers. The plant produces vibrant yellow or orange blooms that are typically borne on a single stem. It thrives in well-drained soil and full sun, making it a popular choice for gardens. Its ornamental value is enhanced by its long-lasting flowers and elegant appearance.
